clinical_study.brief_title: The Changing Panorama in Risk Factors of Cerebral Palsy
clinical_study.official_title: The Changing Panorama in Risk Factors of Cerebral Palsy: A Single National Tertiary Center Experience

brief_summary.textblock: The study will be carried of scanning the database of 296 individuals with cerebral palsy followed in the university pediatric rehabilitation clinic. Cerebral palsy risk factors and demographic information will be obtained from the database. The data will be classified according to date of birth, divided into 3 groups: those born before 2000, those born between 2000-2010, and those born after 2010.Changes in cerebral palsy risk factors will be investigated at 10-year intervals.

detailed_description.textblock:
The study will be carried of scanning the database of 296 individuals with cerebral palsy followed in the university pediatric rehabilitation clinic. Cerebral palsy risk factors and demographic information will be obtained from the database.
Cerebral palsy subtypes classified according to The Surveillance for Cerebral Palsy in Europe (SCPE) classification into four groups: spastic (unilateral and bilateral), dyskinetic (dystonic and choreoathetoic), ataxic/hypotonic, non-classifiable. Cerebral palsy risk factors will be primarily divided into 4 as preconceptional, antenatal, intrapartum and neonatal risk factors. Then, risk factors in the data will be distributed to the appropriate risk factor group.
The data will be classified according to date of birth, divided into 3 groups: those born before 2000, those born between 2000-2010, and those born after 2010. Changes in cerebral palsy risk factors will be investigated at 10-year intervals.

primary_outcome.measure: Define the risk factors of cerebral palsy
primary_outcome.description: Risk factors of cerebral palsy questioned as preconceptional, antenatal, intrapartum and neonatal.

primary_outcome.measure: Define the change in the risk factors among age groups
primary_outcome.description: The difference in cerebral palsy risk factors in age groups measured by chi-square statistics (born before 2000/ born between 2000-2010/ born after 2010)

arm_group.description: No patient treatment is associated with the study.
No patient treatment is associated with the study.
No patient treatment is associated with the study.

intervention.intervention_name: No intervention is associated with the study.
intervention.description: No intervention is associated with the study.

study_pop.textblock: All patients in our cerebral palsy database

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- cerebral palsy patients
Exclusion Criteria:
- missing data on the cerebral palsy database

facility.name: Istanbul Medeniyet University Faculty of Medicine, Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation Department
